question: Pod manifest using serviceAccountName app-sa and not auto-mounting token.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  serviceAccountName: app-sa
  automountServiceAccountToken: false
  containers:
  - name: busybox
    image: busybox
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 3600
